name: NSRegularExpression.MatchingFlags
desc: Set by the Block as the matching progresses, completes, or fails. Used by the method enumerateMatches(in:options:range:using:).

items.name: static var progress: NSRegularExpression.MatchingFlags
items.desc: Set when the Block is called to report progress during a long-running match operation.

items.name: static var completed: NSRegularExpression.MatchingFlags
items.desc: Set when the Block is called after matching has completed.

items.name: static var hitEnd: NSRegularExpression.MatchingFlags
items.desc: Set when the current match operation reached the end of the search range.

items.name: static var requiredEnd: NSRegularExpression.MatchingFlags
items.desc: Set when the current match depended on the location of the end of the search range.

items.name: static var internalError: NSRegularExpression.MatchingFlags
items.desc: Set when matching failed due to an internal error.
